replies.msg:
1. 當一個chemical reaction 係endothermic (ΔH>0)，product 定reactant 有多啲energy？product 定reactant 穩定啲？

2. At constant P and high&constant T，當一個chemical reaction 係endothermic (ΔH>0) 又係exogenic (ΔG<0)，product 定reactant 有多啲energy？product 定reactant 穩定啲？
全能連登仔
搵功課答案就上chegg 啦

quote.msg: 搵功課答案就上chegg 啦

replies.msg: 求明燈指引唔明ΔH>0 and ΔG<0 究其product 係more stable 定less stable

quote.msg: 搵功課答案就上chegg 啦
求明燈指引唔明ΔH>0 and ΔG<0 究其product 係more stable 定less stable

replies.msg:
ΔG=ΔH-TΔS


Constant Pressure同Temp的時候，當ΔG係負數，化學反應就會自動進行。

用A+B》C做例子，ΔG係負數的話，化學反應會自動進行。
基於物質通常傾向處於穩定狀態，依個情況可以話product more stable。

quote.msg: 搵功課答案就上chegg 啦
求明燈指引唔明ΔH>0 and ΔG<0 究其product 係more stable 定less stable

replies.msg:
ΔG = ΔH - T * ΔS
Given ΔH>0 (+ve) and ΔG<0 (-ve)
(-ve) = (+ve) - T * ΔS
Thus, ΔS>0 (+ve) system becomes more disordered during the reaction
Similarly, the reaction is spontaneous at high T as ΔG<0

Reaction with ΔG<0 (-ve) release free energy from the system
As ΔG = G(final or product) - G(initial or reactant)
G(initial or reactant) > G(final or product)
G(final or product) has less free energy (more stable)

利申: 垃圾

quote.msg: 搵功課答案就上chegg 啦
求明燈指引唔明ΔH>0 and ΔG<0 究其product 係more stable 定less stable

ΔG=ΔH-TΔS


Constant Pressure同Temp的時候，當ΔG係負數，化學反應就會自動進行。

用A+B》C做例子，ΔG係負數的話，化學反應會自動進行。
基於物質通常傾向處於穩定狀態，依個情況可以話product more stable。

replies.msg:
謝謝回覆

當我地討論ΔG=ΔH-TΔS既時候，都可能會將佢分成唔同正負既ΔH同ΔS，再睇下出黎既ΔG係正定負，去知道個reaction 係咪spontaneous。我呢度想主要討論ΔH>0，所以唔理ΔH<0，有兩種情況：ΔS>0 and ΔS<0。

1. 當ΔH>0 and ΔS>0，ΔG<0 for high T，ΔG>0 for small T；
2. 當ΔH>0 and ΔS<0，ΔG>0 for all T。

上面第二種係non spontaneous reaction，反正佢唔會做reaction，我地暫唔討論佢product 既stability。而第一種情況如果T夠高就會好似巴打所講，product 會係more stable。

令我困擾既地方係佢ΔH>0，即係system做reaction 過程係吸收surroundings 既thermal energy，照道理product 應該有higher energy (constant P)，照道理應該會less stable。所以根據我以上ΔG<0 product more stable 同ΔH>0 product less stable兩個conclusion，我解唔通

quote.msg: 搵功課答案就上chegg 啦
求明燈指引唔明ΔH>0 and ΔG<0 究其product 係more stable 定less stable

ΔG = ΔH - T * ΔS
Given ΔH>0 (+ve) and ΔG<0 (-ve)
(-ve) = (+ve) - T * ΔS
Thus, ΔS>0 (+ve) system becomes more disordered during the reaction
Similarly, the reaction is spontaneous at high T as ΔG<0

Reaction with ΔG<0 (-ve) release free energy from the system
As ΔG = G(final or product) - G(initial or reactant)
G(initial or reactant) > G(final or product)
G(final or product) has less free energy (more stable)

利申: 垃圾

replies.msg: 我地應該同相似既事實有共識麻煩巴打睇睇我上面既掙扎位

quote.msg: 求明燈指引唔明ΔH>0 and ΔG<0 究其product 係more stable 定less stable

ΔG=ΔH-TΔS


Constant Pressure同Temp的時候，當ΔG係負數，化學反應就會自動進行。

用A+B》C做例子，ΔG係負數的話，化學反應會自動進行。
基於物質通常傾向處於穩定狀態，依個情況可以話product more stable。

謝謝回覆

當我地討論ΔG=ΔH-TΔS既時候，都可能會將佢分成唔同正負既ΔH同ΔS，再睇下出黎既ΔG係正定負，去知道個reaction 係咪spontaneous。我呢度想主要討論ΔH>0，所以唔理ΔH<0，有兩種情況：ΔS>0 and ΔS<0。

1. 當ΔH>0 and ΔS>0，ΔG<0 for high T，ΔG>0 for small T；
2. 當ΔH>0 and ΔS<0，ΔG>0 for all T。

上面第二種係non spontaneous reaction，反正佢唔會做reaction，我地暫唔討論佢product 既stability。而第一種情況如果T夠高就會好似巴打所講，product 會係more stable。

令我困擾既地方係佢ΔH>0，即係system做reaction 過程係吸收surroundings 既thermal energy，照道理product 應該有higher energy (constant P)，照道理應該會less stable。所以根據我以上ΔG<0 product more stable 同ΔH>0 product less stable兩個conclusion，我解唔通

replies.msg:
ΔG=ΔH-TΔS


ΔG<0 ；ΔH>0的話，TΔS就要夠大先可以成立。

通常依個情況會發生係出現更多product的情況，例如高溫令N2O4變2NO2，多咗molecule就會增加degree of randomness，所以就傾向會發生。

至於2NO2係唔係會stable高N2O4，就取決於當時的T能唔能夠大過令到ΔS>ΔH。

謝謝回覆

當我地討論ΔG=ΔH-TΔS既時候，都可能會將佢分成唔同正負既ΔH同ΔS，再睇下出黎既ΔG係正定負，去知道個reaction 係咪spontaneous。我呢度想主要討論ΔH>0，所以唔理ΔH<0，有兩種情況：ΔS>0 and ΔS<0。

1. 當ΔH>0 and ΔS>0，ΔG<0 for high T，ΔG>0 for small T；
2. 當ΔH>0 and ΔS<0，ΔG>0 for all T。

上面第二種係non spontaneous reaction，反正佢唔會做reaction，我地暫唔討論佢product 既stability。而第一種情況如果T夠高就會好似巴打所講，product 會係more stable。

令我困擾既地方係佢ΔH>0，即係system做reaction 過程係吸收surroundings 既thermal energy，照道理product 應該有higher energy (constant P)，照道理應該會less stable。所以根據我以上ΔG<0 product more stable 同ΔH>0 product less stable兩個conclusion，我解唔通

ΔG=ΔH-TΔS


ΔG<0 ；ΔH>0的話，TΔS就要夠大先可以成立。

通常依個情況會發生係出現更多product的情況，例如高溫令N2O4變2NO2，多咗molecule就會增加degree of randomness，所以就傾向會發生。

至於2NO2係唔係會stable高N2O4，就取決於當時的T能唔能夠大過令到ΔS>ΔH。

replies.msg:
例子好適合中哂啲條件

我開始有少少頭緒，巴打睇下我呢個conclusion 有無誤會左你意思。

1. Reaction 既ΔH +ve/-ve 唔可以直接決定product 係more stable than less stable than reactant，只可以知道product 既energy 係高左定低左。
2. 要endothermic reaction既product more stable 的話，必要條件係T>>0 & ΔS>0。

第一句我明，但要啲時間接受，因為我成日覺得energy 高=not stable and energy 低=stable

replies.msg:
或者用第二個角度去諗，冰的energy係比會水低。

但係室溫狀態的時候，強迫一嚿冰呈現成冰的狀態，會比佢呈然成水的狀態更加困難。

所以齋睇佢嗰反應吸唔吸熱，同product夠唔夠stable，係唔足夠，而deltaG就係想包攬埋其他因素而判斷嗰反應會唔會自動進行。

咁易都問？ 書一定有

quote.msg: 咁易都問？ 書一定有

replies.msg: 上面講緊chemical stability 同system stability巴打可唔可以講多啲

我明白，因為我啲concept 唔清所以題目好古怪其實delta H只係一個例子，delta S 都係同一情況。

我之前既矛盾位係：
1. energy越低，chemical越stable
2. Delta H>0 既product energy會高左，所以product more unstable / chemically unstable
3. Delta H>0 and delta G<0 既情況會出現，但我知for a fact delta G<0，product 一定會stable 左

Question to answer: 既然delta H>0 會出啲無咁stable既product，點解呢個reaction 會發生呢？

上面第一位巴打提醒左我，如果要討論product stability，delta H只係其中一個因素，主要都要睇delta G +ve/-ve 先決定到。

replies.msg:
Enthalpy/Energy同stability冇直接關係
睇Helmholtz/Gibbs potential (free energy)
但係delta increase
系統enthalpy高咗可以理解為energy高咗

replies.msg:
同埋gibbs potential都唔exactly係stability in a general sense
Gibbs free energy/Gibbs potential (G)係spontaneity, i.e. thermodynamic stability
因為仲要睇kinetic stability
例如個decomposition/reverse reaction嘅activation energy好高咁一樣嘢雖然thermodynamically unstable但係kinetically stable

replies.msg:
鑽石嘅話
唔一定係T嘅事架
可以係P (pressure/壓強)係某個value都得
dG = dH - TdS = VdP - SdT + Σ(μ[x]dN[x])
N is the no. of particles/no. of moles of species x.
反正你最後個G<0就係spontaneous
所以冇話係T一定係必要條件
同埋咩叫T much higher than 0 (assume absolute temperature)先?
1500K? 15000K?
btw kinetic stability係睇rate of reverse reaction啫
所以根據Arrhenius equation
一般嚟講T越高
reaction rate越大

quote.msg:
同埋gibbs potential都唔exactly係stability in a general sense
Gibbs free energy/Gibbs potential (G)係spontaneity, i.e. thermodynamic stability
因為仲要睇kinetic stability
例如個decomposition/reverse reaction嘅activation energy好高咁一樣嘢雖然thermodynamically unstable但係kinetically stable
明白你既意思，好似係diamond 同graphite既關係。但想請教一下，如果diamond -> graphite 呢個forward reaction 係spontaneous的話，必要條件一定係T>>0嗎？我諗呢個high T應該令佢kinetically 都unstable？

鑽石嘅話
唔一定係T嘅事架
可以係P (pressure/壓強)係某個value都得
dG = dH - TdS = VdP - SdT + Σ(μ[x]dN[x])
N is the no. of particles/no. of moles of species x.
反正你最後個G<0就係spontaneous
所以冇話係T一定係必要條件
同埋咩叫T much higher than 0 (assume absolute temperature)先?
1500K? 15000K?
btw kinetic stability係睇rate of reverse reaction啫
所以根據Arrhenius equation
一般嚟講T越高
reaction rate越大

replies.msg:
明白，我岩岩一心諗住講開delta H所以用dG = dH - TdS 所以只考慮左constant P同避開講A，講得唔好唔好意思
我用T>>0 notation想指high T，能夠overcome Ea既意思，好耐無接觸thermodynamics 所以d notation 唔太掌握

巴打隨手打都好熟我有時個腦袋慢慢轉緊所以慢啲跟到唔好介意

我反而真係唔記得左kinetically stable 同reverse reaction 既關係，係咪Boltzmann distribution curve 過左Ea既area 越多就係越kinetically unstable？

replies.msg:
如果你用鑽石同graphite既關係既話,正正要point out兩樣野
一個reaction佢發唔發生取決於2樣野
1) Thermodynamic stability, 姐係你所講既既spontaneous
2) kinetic inert, 姐係你所講既Ea
即使product唔係thermodynamically stable,但係如果Ea係細既話,佢係有可能發生,但如果Ea太大,即使佢product係thermodynamically stable都好,個reaction唔太possible(即係樓上講既rate of reaction)
當然possibility哩家野都取決於temperature(影響rate of reaction)
咁所以一個reaction發唔發生係取決於好多factor但mainly都係上面果2個,而上面果2個factor又會衍生出好多factor

反正你最後個G<0就係spontaneous
所以冇話係T一定係必要條件
同埋咩叫T much higher than 0 (assume absolute temperature)先?
1500K? 15000K?
btw kinetic stability係睇rate of reverse reaction啫
所以根據Arrhenius equation
一般嚟講T越高
reaction rate越大

replies.msg:
呢度個concept 我覺得幾得意，唔知你地點睇。

當reaction 既delta G<0，就必定係thermodynamically unstable，有個好明顯既界線。但當講到kinetically stable/unstable，要講啲reactant 可唔可以過到個Ea threshold，而當佢呢個reaction delta G<0，過唔過到Ea 就變左statistic (好似)，個條明顯界線就消失左

因為如果越多molecule嘅energy高過一個decomposition pathway嘅rate determining step（highest E step）嘅activation energy
咁啫係越多molecule會decompose
chemical rate啲嘢我冇thermo咁熟

呢度個concept 我覺得幾得意，唔知你地點睇。

當reaction 既delta G<0，就必定係thermodynamically unstable，有個好明顯既界線。但當講到kinetically stable/unstable，要講啲reactant 可唔可以過到個Ea threshold，而當佢呢個reaction delta G<0，過唔過到Ea 就變左statistic (好似)，個條明顯界線就消失左

replies.msg:
其實Ea 都係條界
只不過KE measurement 係一個distribution
而唔係universal 一個value 大家一樣

就會有 spontaneous change

咁要睇thermodynamic
delta G < 0 就叫unstable

如果我要比較兩隻野 既stability toward a reaction e.g. oxidation
我睇delta H 就得

應該係咁

replies.msg:
呢個已經係qm
其實睇過atkins本reference book話到依家點解dihydrogen (H2)嗰bonding orbital比較stable未有定論
最常見就係話當electron入咗internuclear region嘅話energy會低咗(有兩個positive charge吸住嗰有negative charge嘅particle, potential E會低咗)
因為有嗰講法係如果電子入咗internuclear region嘅話energy反而係高咗
但係同時電子去咗internuclear region會令嗰orbital shrink in size
“……This orbital shrinkage improves the electron-nucleus attraction more than it is decreased by the migration to the internuclear region, so there is a net lowering of potential energy.”
